Determine the velocity at point F using conservation of mechanical energy from point E to point F.
Substitute v_E = 1.4 m/s and R = 0.2 m.
Calculate v_F^2 = 9.8, thus v_F = sqrt(9.8) ≈ 3.13 m/s.

Calculate time t using vertical motion: H + 2R = (1/2)gt^2.
